new_ui.py¶

class new_ui.ControlUI¶

Creates the UI to control the tello.

action(name)¶

Sends takeoff-land-emergency command to tello.

initialize()¶

Initializes tello and updates displayed status.

load_session()¶

User chooses a session file and tello reruns its commands.

move(event)¶

Maps key pressed to a valid tello command, gets the distance and sends it. If tello is not initialzed, ignores the key press events.

save_session()¶

Waits for user to input the session id and saves it in a txt file.

start_stream()¶

Sends streamon command and starts the video thread.

stop_stream()¶

Sends streamoff command and sets stream_flag False to stop the video looping thread.

update_battery()¶

Retrieves the battery level of tello and displays it in battery label.

update_status()¶

Gets the tello status and refreshes the status label.

video_loop()¶

Reads the tello frame, converts it to PIL image and updates the GUI image.
